modName: Realvision ENB Natural Preset and Night Eye Fixes
summary:
Not overwriting night-eye, other post-processing effect while maintain the natural look of ENB!
Also fix uncorrect lightning, fog too!
descriptionHtml:
[center]


[size=2][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/64954-1-1429704056.jpg[/img][/size]


[size=2]This is my personal preset intended to make ENB [/size][color=#f9cb9c]compatible[/color][size=2] [/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]with[/size][/font][size=2] the [/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2]game[/size][/font][size=2] post-processing effects.[/size][color=#ffff00]
[/color]
[size=2]When I first know and use ENB. It's doing well until I first notice that some screen effect are not present. That really breaks the immersion for me. After that, I Googled the solution and haven't found any decent solution at all. So I decided to make one![/size]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/64954-1-1429706449.jpg[/img]


[color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Features[/size][/color]

[size=2][color=#f6b26b]-[/color]An [/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]ENB[/font][size=2] preset that is not completely overwrite the game post processing(Night-eye, Poison effect, Screen fx, etc.)[/size]

[size=2][color=#f6b26b]-[/color]Little vibrant, more natural atmosphere ENB.[/size]

[size=2][color=#f6b26b]-[/color]Fix for a[/size][size=2] fog color not matching the sky color.[/size]

[size=2][color=#f6b26b]-[/color]Good performance and quality. (if you want performance. disable DOF and AO)[/size]

[size=2][color=#f6b26b]-[/color]Looks good especially in interior and at night.[/size]

[size=2][color=#f6b26b]-[/color]Likely to work with any weather mod. (Using vanilla fog color so it should work fine)[/size]


[color=#6d9eeb][size=5]Installation[/size][/color]

[size=2]1[color=#1e84cc])[/color] Install ENB with [/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Realvision ENB [/font][size=2] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936[/size]

[size=2]2[color=#1e84cc])[/color] Install my file! (overwrite [/size][size=2], [/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]ENB[/font][size=2] file)[/size]

[size=2]3[color=#1e84cc])[/color] Install [/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]this:[/font][size=2] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29001 (not necessary, only recommended)[/size]

[size=2]4) [/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Enjoy![/font]

[color=#3c78d8][size=5]Credits[/size][/color]

[size=2]RealVision ENB (SkyrimTuner)[/size]
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936[/url][/size]

[size=2]Boris Vorontsov for his ENB[/size]
[size=2][url=http://enbdev.com/index_en.html]http://enbdev.com/index_en.html[/url][/size]

[size=2][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/64954-1-1429706218.png[/img][/size][/center]
author: jimboom555
